name: Little Lost Bobbles
summary: In Little Lost Bobbles, the search for the endearing Little Lost Bobbles offers two delightful modes of exploration. Take to the skies aboard the Jellycopter, a whimsical flying contraption designed for scouting missions. Navigate the landscapes from above, scanning the terrain for any signs of the adorable Bobbles. Once spotted, swoop down and carefully scoop them up, ensuring their safe return to their families.
